code: import React from"react";import"./Counter.css";import AnimatedDigit from"./AnimatedDigit.tsx";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const numberToDigitArray=number=>{return number.toString().split('').map(Number);};const Counter=_ref=>{let{count}=_ref;const animated=!window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)').matches;let animatedDigits=[];if(animated){numberToDigitArray(count).forEach((digit,index)=>{animatedDigits.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimatedDigit,{targetDigit:digit},index));});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"counter-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Count: "}),!animated?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"count",children:count}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"animated-digits",children:animatedDigits})]});};export default Counter;
